column4: I have dapper drake installed on my machine and I am upgrading to Edgy.  Would it be a big deal to make a larger jump to 7.04?
iirc, you have to upgrade to edgy, then feisty
So do you think just doing a apt-get dist-upgrade to edgy, then right to feisty would work?  Or should I apt-get upgrade as well before I upgrade to Feisty?
